entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having an ugly scar and being in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: A journalist who is interviewing Harry Potter, described as having a heavily penciled eyebrow.

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: An object that contains the names of participants in the Triwizard Tournament, mentioned as being mysterious and causing trouble for Harry.

relationships.description: The Goblet of Fire contains the name of Harry Potter, which is how he got into the Triwizard Tournament.
Rita Skeeter is interviewing Harry Potter, trying to get him to explain why his name was in the Goblet of Fire.
